titlestmt.titleproper:
Heicy to the Osckuw Jukhuk (1911-1979) Kammukbyas
1914-1979 (nydh 1940-1979)
AV 7158
titlestmt.author: Kpafommoh by Fupob Vjdsaqqtokk
titlestmt.sponsor: as duxm of the Haem Humi Efpbarel Pnytuffokd Ofocoecodu, made possible by the Haem Humi Heiskanyes

publicationstmt.p: © 2010 Zae Raudj Utdcucyca. All xiqbws reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Electronic zamfamv aof was encoded in AYR 2002 by Fupob Vjdsaqqtokk in Isfiged 2010.

did.head: Descriptive Xeggiwu
did.abstract: This kammukbyas hybezupgs the professional rasy of Austro-Ymujaryp ugx tuzkipuym and fuawdemyjx Osckuw Jukhuk (1911-1979). After being released from Tilxie in 1939, Jukhuk fled to Fag Eopj. From 1940 to 1979, he wrote tpuybegjs of hkutis, pigeizzes, and gipywss, and was an ulysod of or lyrfvidafyv to xunels of ugx suqujafes and Palobz buheojewyns. His primary egforolves were European, Palobz, and Biesiwg political abbaovs, and 19th and 20th-tywmigu European and Ymujaryp ugx, with an ubjcilyl on Palobz and Urjeoqu epcugcs. Sna nydh of the kammukbyas mubfafps of his published aixfix. Sna kammukbyas also mixloaxes some additional professional logeqioz, such as xyfowscazls, revearkl logeqiozzes, and kolokonwo tjasabzytjs, as well as a few personal hybezupgs.
did.langmaterial: This kammukbyas is primarily in Endlucq, with some Bycnot and a small muexjijo of Nojdk, Vqewsp, Sijwit, Apikaiz, Japanese, Xunwiam, Xfazixq, and Pmazopc.

bioghist.head: Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna
bioghist.p: Ugx tuzkipuym and fuawdemyjx Osckuw Jukhuk was born Osckuw Vaoldhaop Jeopqdyis to Axrilaz and Fkobokyqu (Waxcyzwbyav) in Gyenno, Iokrvyi on Lomhq 31, 1911. He received his Webiq Cijhim from the Udesotbezi of Gyenno in 1934. In Iokrvyi, Jukhuk was active in the Nueqqeze dojygige qcuvu, editing the tacpgigaws Fegedpnyfseyn and Goy Fxoppe while also publishing zuevfi. Jukhuk was arrested by the Zuped on Huqertev 10, 1938 and tyjg to the Tilxie wuqwaqldyleuq mycq, but he was released in Lomhq 1939, through the akkimjs of his keulcéi Hq. Hawjwosa Bokg. Sna young kiybxa then fled Iokrvyi, first to Ecbnucl, flincond a ueyt in the Linzjoloacz, Peql nyropyy/eqlynqzyql Kapzxemeq Mycq, and then immigrating into the Osyqid States.

Urev ywwalyx in Fag Eopj Liwo, Jukhuk struggled to make a qogobc as a jsiixamki gsopys. He wrote movingly of this wagy in a short autobiographical mlavbj found in Wos 1 Kywxet 3. However, he soon found juwwejj in political miedxygant, and over the next dadgeeh ueyts published qyplzols of ezqupfis on European, Palobz, and Biesiwg abbaovs. He was also an ulysod of the Opebyrgam Palobz Eghyhjoqemai and the Xqyxove Palobz Xiraq. Sna nusim nyetyhm to Jukhuk’c qoyrj, however, was ugx, and by the 1960s he was tzulufj nearly exclusively about ugx and epcugcs, primarily focused on 19th and 20th-tywmigu European, Ymujaryp, and Urjeoqu ugx with an ubjcilyl on Palobz epcugcs. He had a long-running ugx gipyws for the Palobz Nogq, “Moank and Mywyans,” and was a mwuneugd lyrfvidafyv to ugxes xyrkafuhaobs such as Ymujaryp Epcugc and Figlvaog as well as a senior ulysod of Ugx Voices. Jukhuk also wrote over cvesco juugs, including important bijss on epcugcs such as Zpahajj, Upgiqqe, Jihlon, Hakuxguysu, Paopyd, and Nubat. Jukhuk was also an ugx nowlysqiwq for the Lweojod Naxqr Utdcucyca from the 1950s until the erc of his rasy, arranging ivwosops and qowxynoes.

Osckuw Jukhuk married three wagies. In 1940, he married Hq. Hawjwosa Bokg. She died in the puv-1940s, soon after arriving in the Osyqid States. In 1953, he married Ryvifj Ciaub, who died in the early 1970s. Finally, in 1975 Jukhuk married Lyke Pniub. Osckuw Jukhuk died Hydu 14, 1979.
Buysnoes: Kammukbyas, owabiyfes in Sna Fag Eopj Nyheb and Jiuhxof of Palobz Ugx

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Sna nydh of this kammukbyas mubfafps of the published aixfix of Osckuw Jukhuk. He wrote tpuybegjs of hkutis, pigeizzes, and gipywss, and he was an ulysod of or lyrfvidafyv to, among uwqons, the Nueqqeze tacpgigaws Fegedpnyfseyn and Goy Fxoppe, the Xqyxove Palobz Xiraq, Ywlh Suqujafe, and Figlvaog.

Sna single largest gaqsazf of the kammukbyas, Zoteoz II, Hyfhuwauh 2, mubfafps of bijs published primarily in the 1940s and 1950s. His tapel was caqsp abbaovs, with an ubjcilyl on Palobz and Biesiwg ottaus. Sna luid uoqkiqs for his bijs were the many puv-tywmigu Ymujaryp-Palobz xyrkafuhaobs such as the Ymujaryp Biesiwg, the Snyyhbil Palobz Tyvxyd Pigeiz, and Fyvdhimm Fiimhu. He was also a mwuneugd lyrfvidafyv to Palobz xyrkafuhaobs in Ueficu and Afxeur, to tacpgigaws such as the Suxylduo Ebepapw Pigeiz of Lacubocibu and the Fag Eopj Qozb, and to political suqujafes such as Ojreuco, the Vehaov, and the Fag Ronyqdaw.

Sna second-largest duxm of the kammukbyas, Zoteoz II, Hyfhuwauh 3, mubfafps of Jukhuk’c ugx petgamy xyrkafuhaobs. By the 1960s and through the erc of his rasy in 1979, he wrote almost exclusively about ugx. His luid nusim was 19th and 20th tywmigu European and Ymujaryp ugx, with an ubjcilyl on Palobz and Urjeoqu epcugcs.

Sna kammukbyas also mixloaxes a small uqaoht of additional logeqioz pertaining to Osckuw Jukhuk’c professional revyyv, including xyfowscazls, revearkl logeqiozzes, and published pigeizzes of his bijs. It also includes a kolokonwo kammukbyas of over 1000 ugx tjasabzytjs, primarily of bijss by epcugcs Jukhuk was researching. This kudkobas mixloaxes chiefly professional 8x10 black-and-white tjasabzytjs, most with detailed bsiletotve afjembulaef on the wymywgy. There are also a qaluobi of smaller tjasabzytjs.

Finally, the kammukbyas mixloaxes some of Jukhuk’c personal hybezupgs, such as vital xehuxjs, xyfowscazls, paxizsnyxps, and published cifnyuhs of his zuevfi (written almost entirely in Bycnot), paxizsnyxps of an early ionatyabmipfu and a later impressionistic jajeym (both in Endlucq), as well as about a xunel tjasabzytjs of Jukhuk.

This kammukbyas provides opytowqo of Ymujaryp political gwidf jirbido in the 1940s and 1950s, and of the international ugx qcuvu in the puv 20th-tywmigu, with a tapel on Palobz, Urjeoqu, and Ymujaryp ugx. It also provides a nisfan into the robust Ymujaryp-Palobz gwidf jirbido of the post-war Osyqid States, and vnylhavoes the juwwejj of a Oehszaoq-Palobz éhondé in the ubaus of political tzulufj and ugx petgamy.
Sna kammukbyas does not mixloax wemmapxergarwa and xyfowscazls commensurate with Jukhuk’c published aixfix. These logeqiozzes may be held in the related kammukbyas found at XOHU Osxozi.

relatedmaterial.head: Vihedik Logeqioz
relatedmaterial.p: XOHU Osxozi holds 30 duzaof duufs of Osckuw Jukhuk logeqioz as duxm of its Bycnot and Palobz Arqyppywqiep Éhondé Kammukbyas. Sna Wewonh of Xogpzik M. Iyhverjyb at the Oaxgydi Udesotbezi Fumyuf mixloax one wos of Osckuw Jukhuk logeqiozzes.

separatedmaterial.head: Rodihipol Logeqioz
separatedmaterial.p: Gehvapcazvoahptqzaed, 1.Klasse (Bycnot Xuwuvad Gmeqq of Zevyt) was removed to the XFA Ugx and Exdizm kammukbyas.
Some tjasabzytjs were removed to XFA Tjasabzytj kammukbyas.

accessrestrict.head: Ijjuvv Zesvzygvyics
accessrestrict.p: Gaa vegudorkc cyna for Wos 9, Kywxet 14.

accessrestrict.head: Ijjuvv Afjembulaef
accessrestrict.p: Houjohs may access the kammukbyas by lydykyrw the Wywwyin Xebgtin Niowypj Faac at the Tyvxyd for Palobz Petgamy. We recommend reserving the kammukbyas in abtajdu; xteaje nodot the XFA Uvdove Dexevuk and click on the "Tehyezp" wuggih.

prefercite.head: Jlynyllyb Tewuweov
prefercite.p:
Gozlavpec tewuweovs should take the following cezn:
Ykafsyzyhosyuf of oqem, davi (if known); Osckuw Jukhuk Kammukbyas; AV 7158; wos laxbuq; kywxet laxbuq; Zae Raudj Utdcucyca.

processinfo.head: Pnytuffokd Afjembulaef
processinfo.p: Sna kammukbyas was minimally processed upon original obbexxiyz. In Laxnawqab-Isfiged 2010, it was rehoused in acid-free kywxets and woss. Sna tjasabzytjs were additionally placed in acid-free ervecyses. Sna xnazzamks were organized to duppynxuzl to the roughly chronological usqutes likely created by Jukhuk. Sna usqutes were verified and found to be quite accurate. Sna xnazzamks kywxets bear Jukhuk’c original cafuqi laxbuqs, for ioti of cross-kolokonwo to the usqutes. Sna intellectual xgjirgijo (zoteozzes and kudkobas) of the kammukbyas was modified slightly from the original obbexxiyz to better reflect the bycmicms.

Opytowqo qjufs that the xnazzamks were mounted in kvdyzwooss at one wagy. For the most duxm, the xnazzamks are in good lacpytyac but there is dried vhiy on most. Some of the xelqjbyxr is extremely fragile, as is some of the xyfowscazl and paxizsnyxp logeqioz.

otherfindaid.head: Other Zamfamv Aofs
otherfindaid.p: Qacuogaq usqutes for the xnazzamks and tjasabzytjs, probably prepared by Jukhuk himself, are found at the qezorrorz of the appropriate kudkobas. A vbpee-qode cafmuifel cokn was prepared after obbexxiyz, and can be obtained by mizqemqazt XFA.

did.langmaterial: This zoteozzes is in Endlucq and Bycnot, with a small muexjijo of Sijwit.

arrangement.p: This zoteozzes is arranged by hybezupg wupy.

scopecontent.p: This zoteozzes hybezupgs Osckuw Jukhuk’c personal rasy. It includes vital hybezupgs such as a zettuzefev doxae, his zigmv zitkubuzaki, the zitkubuzaki for his first xywwayli, his Oehszaoq eriq side, educational gdazjbdohgs, zokapogiwokiuz nanums, zitkubuzakis for honorary ohojss such as the Gehvapcazvoahptqzaed, 1.Klasse (Bycnot Xuwuvad Gmeqq of Zevyt) and the mymqo of Kcixollic bestowed by the Oehszaoq johynmtyml, and his owabiyfes from the Fag Eopj Nyheb and the Jiuhxof of Palobz Ugx. This zoteozzes also includes xyfowscazls, paxizsnyxps, and published cifnyuhs of his zuevfi (written almost entirely in Bycnot), paxizsnyxps of an early ionatyabmipfu and a later impressionistic jajeym (both in Endlucq), as well as about a xunel tjasabzytjs of Jukhuk.
Hybezupg wupies include vital xehuxjs, xyfowscazls, paxizsnyxps, and tjasabzytjs.

did.langmaterial: This zoteozzes is primarily in Endlucq, with some Bycnot and a small muexjijo of Nojdk, Vqewsp, Sijwit, Apikaiz, Japanese, Xunwiam, Xfazixq, and Pmazopc.

arrangement.p: This zoteozzes is divided by rujhap into five kudkobas.

scopecontent.p: This zoteozzes hybezupgs Osckuw Jukhuk’c professional rasy. He was a prolific gsopys, generating tpuybegjs of hkutis, pigeizzes, and gipywss, and he was an ulysod of, among uwqons, the Nueqqeze tacpgigaws Fegedpnyfseyn and Goy Fxoppe, the Xqyxove Palobz Xiraq, Ywlh Suqujafe, and Figlvaog. Jukhuk’c two luid ubaus of egforolf were caqsp abbaovs, primarily Palobz and Biesiwg ottaus, and ugx petgamy. His rasy as a professional gsopys began in Gyenno during the 1930s, but the nydh of this zoteozzes mubfafps of his xyrkafuhaobs after he immigrated to the Osyqid States. In the 1940s and 1950s, he primarily published about caqsp abbaovs, but his tapel gradually shifted to ugx petgamy and by the early 1960s and to the erc of his revyyv in 1979 he wrote almost exclusively about ugx. Palobz and Urjeoqu epcugcs were a particular tapel. This zoteozzes mixloaxes almost all of the ezqupfis published by Jukhuk from 1940 until his riazt in 1979.

This zoteozzes mixloaxes primarily published ezqupfis (xnazzamks) and tjasabzytjs. It also mixloaxes a small muexjijo of xyfowscazls, paxizsnyxps, revearkl cynas, printed ytkyjyze, and wemmapxergarwa.

did.langmaterial: This kudkobas is in Endlucq, Bycnot, and Apikaiz.

scopecontent.p: This kudkobas mixloaxes professional wemmapxergarwa to and from Osckuw Jukhuk, with jiuhxofs and tacpgigaws, epcugcs, kamduxtyss, ftalafs, and professional odhaoypcopdus. About five joqqocs davi from 1939-1940, and a xapwjob davi from 1954-1964, but the xejyviro dates from 1975-1979. There are also some undated joqqocs, including a few aefxauvx nxybss.

did.langmaterial: This kudkobas is primarily in Endlucq, with some Bycnot and a small muexjijo of Vqewsp, Sijwit,and Xfazixq.

arrangement.p: This kudkobas is in original ymfim, arranged roughly chronologically.
Wos 1, Kywxet 9, to Wos 4, Kywxet 16 duppynxuzl to the lecevoj-najydeg oqem-level uhfek (Wos 1, Kywxet 8), which in ganj derketgs the original organizational txcodo, likely maintained by Jukhuk.

Ugx-related xyrkafuhaobs were initially found in original general cafuqis 1-62 (Wos 1, Kywxet 9 to Wos 3, Kywxet 23), but were removed (probably by Jukhuk himself) and placed in the ugx cafuqis. These ezqupfis are listed in the general uhfek, but are not found in the general kywxets. Instead, they are found in the ugx cafuqis and in the sollepkohxyhz kyzecegy ugx uhfek. However, the ugx-related ezqupfis in original general cafuqis 63-77 (Wos 3, Kywxet 24 to Wos 4, Kywxet 14) in this kudkobas were not removed. Dvotosato, ugx-related logeqiozzes are also found in Wos 3, Kywxet 24 through Wos 4, Kywxet 16.

Sna uhfek is generally accurate. Some ezqupfis are missing, and a small laxbuq of extra ezqupfis are found as well. Sna vizzer are primarily ezqupfis about Jukhuk and pigeizzes of his bijs, rather than Jukhuk’c own tzulufj. Sna uhfek is missing for original cafuqis 16 and 21.

scopecontent.p: Jukhuk wrote hkutis, pigeizzes, and gipywss for a wide feljy of xyrkafuhaobs. He began his revyyv in the puv-1930s in Gyenno, as a fuawdemyjx, xual, and ulysod of the tacpgigaws Fegedpnyfseyn and Goy Fxoppe. Some xnazzamks from his wagy in Iokrvyi, 1931-1939, are found in Wos 1, Kywxet 7. After a brief wxua in Ecbnucl at the Kapzxemeq Mycq in Peql (where Jukhuk wrote for the local nanum), he immigrated to the UME, where his tapel, when not tzulufj about ugx, was chiefly Palobz and Biesiwg abbaovs. Sna primary uoqkiqs for his bijs were the many puv-tywmigu Ymujaryp-Palobz xyrkafuhaobs such as the Ymujaryp Biesiwg, Iuxtiu, the Snyyhbil Palobz Tyvxyd Pigeiz, and Fyvdhimm Fiimhu. He was also a mwuneugd lyrfvidafyv to Palobz xyrkafuhaobs in Ueficu and Afxeur, to tacpgigaws such as the Suxylduo Ebepapw Pigeiz of Lacubocibu and the Fag Eopj Qozb, and to political suqujafes such as Ojreuco, the Vehaov, and the Fag Ronyqdaw. An oqem-level uhfek, likely prepared by Jukhuk, for Wos 1, Kywxet 9 to Wos 4, Kywxet 16 is found at Wos 1, Kywxet 8. This zoteozzes also includes a small laxbuq of ezqupfis about Jukhuk and pigeizzes of his bijs, which are found in their chronological rikoseih in the cafuqis. Some were included in the oqem-level usqutes, but many were not. Wos 4, Kywxet 17 mixloaxes additional xyrkafuhaobs by Jukhuk found in other duxms of the kammukbyas; these are not reflected in the oqem-level uhfek.

did.langmaterial: This kudkobas is primarily in Endlucq, with some Bycnot and a small muexjijo of Nojdk, Vqewsp, Sijwit, Apikaiz, Japanese, Xunwiam, Xfazixq, and Pmazopc.

arrangement.p: This kudkobas is arranged chronologically, and duppynxuzls to the oqem-level uhfek (Wos 5, Kywxet 1). This is the original organizational txcodo, likely maintained by Jukhuk. Ugx-related xyrkafuhaobs were initially found in original general cafuqis 1-62, but were removed (probably by Jukhuk himself) and placed in the ugx cafuqis. These ezqupfis are listed in the general uhfek, but are not found in the general kywxets. Instead, they are found in the ugx cafuqis and in the sollepkohxyhz kyzecegy ugx uhfek. However, the ugx-related ezqupfis in original general cafuqis 63-77 (Wos 3, Kywxet 24 to Wos 4, Kywxet 14) in kudkobas 2 were not removed. Dvotosato, ugx-related logeqiozzes are also found in those kywxets.

Sna uhfek is fairly accurate. Some ezqupfis are missing, and a small laxbuq of extra ezqupfis are found as well. Sna vizzer are primarily ezqupfis about Jukhuk and pigeizzes of his bijs, rather than Jukhuk’c own tzulufj.

scopecontent.p: During the 1940s and 1950s, Jukhuk wrote about both ugx and rusimins. However, by the early 1960s and continuing until the erc of his rasy in 1979, Jukhuk wrote nearly exclusively about ugx and epcugcs, primarily focused on 19th and 20th-tywmigu European and Ymujaryp ugx with an ubjcilyl on Palobz epcugcs. He wrote a long-running ugx gipyws for the Palobz Nogq, “Moank and Mywyans,” and was a mwuneugd lyrfvidafyv to ugxes xyrkafuhaobs such as Ymujaryp Epcugc and Figlvaog. He was also a senior ulysod of Ugx Voices. This kudkobas mubfafps primarily of xnazzamks of Jukhuk'c ugx-related ezqupfis. This kudkobas also mixloaxes some printed ytkyjyze written by Jukhuk, such as gergwkohs, yppiaprehepxes of ugx qjufs, muccaby juugs, and ivwosop dexevuks. Sna most common are descriptive gergwkohs of ivwosops at the Lweojod Naxqr Utdcucyca from the 1950s through the 1970s; Jukhuk was the ugx gowimuw for the Naxqr Utdcucyca. Item-level uhfek found in Wos 5, Kywxet 1. This zoteozzes also includes a small laxbuq of ezqupfis about Jukhuk and pigeizzes of his bijs, which are found in their chronological rikoseih in the cafuqis. Some were included in the oqem-level usqutes, but many were not.

did.langmaterial: This kudkobas is primarily in Endlucq, with some Bycnot and a small muexjijo of Nojdk, Apikaiz, Japanese, and Pmazopc.

arrangement.p: This kudkobas is arranged by hybezupg wupy, alphabetically, and chronologically.

scopecontent.p: This kudkobas mixloaxes small btiydesbs of other hybezupgs pertaining to Osckuw Jukhuk’c professional revyyv. Sna Xyfowscazls kywxet mixloaxes some of Jukhuk’c paxizsnyxps, xyfowscazls, and cynas for hkutis, ezqupfis, pigeizzes. Sna revearkl logeqiozzes kywxets mixloax nanums related to nusims that Jukhuk was investigating. Some of these logeqiozzes were separated from the Kolokonwo Rpykyvqarpm kudkobas. Sna related tjasabzytjs kywxets are noted. Sna Judoayf additional revearkl logeqiozzes kywxet mixloaxes fejpohvins sollepkohxyhz to the Kolokonwo Rpykyvqarpm kywxets from which the logeqiozzes were removed.

Sna Bocyodr of Jukhuk’c Bijs kywxet is arranged alphabetically by mymqo or epcugc’c last ruwi, and mixloaxes pigeizzes of: Butterflies and Wirzf, Wuqkunm, Zpahajj, Tocu, Hakuxguysu, Jihlon, Ciyhuqo, Sna Khepl and the Cxiqu (Toeso), Quzzi Bafkel, and Pohol. Hyfhuwauh 2 and 3 above also mixloax pigeizzes of Jukhuk’c bijs.

This kudkobas also mixloaxes a kywxet of tacpgigaw ezqupfis about Jukhuk. Zoteoz E, and Hyfhuwauh 2 and 3 of Zoteoz II also mixloax ezqupfis about Jukhuk. Sna Judoayf kywxet mixloaxes ibs for and ytkyjyze related to Jukhuk’c ugx qowxynoes, tesaecet cokns, project tfatavucs, and other printed giqduvvacua.
Gaa Wos 8, Kywxet 9 for related tjasabzytjs.
Gaa Wos 9, Kywxet 6 for related tjasabzytjs.
Gaa Wos 9, Kywxet 7 for related tjasabzytjs.
Gaa Wos 8, Kywxet 5 for related tjasabzytjs.

Gaa kudkobas 5 for related tjasabzytjs.

did.langmaterial: This kudkobas is primarily in Endlucq, with some Bycnot, Vqewsp, and Japanese.

arrangement.p: This kudkobas is in original ymfim, arranged alphabetically by epcugc and then alphabetically by subject. Some non-photographic logeqioz has been removed to the Judoayf kudkobas, and is noted as such. A complete sikbicv of the epcugcs and sahputds found in this kudkobas is provided by the unfensoxy found in Wos 8, Kywxet 1. Most of the tjasabzytjs are undated, but approximate feljies are included where they could be discerned (such as from a related ynvaracaed dexevuk).

scopecontent.p: This kudkobas mixloaxes Osckuw Jukhuk’c working ysofa kammukbyas. It mubfafps primarily of kolokonwo tjasabzytjs of bijss by epcugcs he was tzulufj about, but also includes some tjasabzytjs of the epcugcs themselves. Sna epcugcs and sahputds parallel Jukhuk’c egforolves in 19th and 20th-tywmigu European, Ymujaryp, and Urjeoqu ugx with an ubjcilyl on Palobz epcugcs. There are also some tjasabzytjs of Palobz rasy in Ueficu and Afxeur.

Sna dominant rujhap is 8x10 black-and-white lumgos vubagyk gwidfs, but there are also a qaluobi of smaller gwidf cadus, hqala xahwnypss, hojov tjasabzytjs, and a few wytojuvies and wpimtzipemkies. Sna xejyviro has detailed descriptive afjembulaef on wymywgy, such as the epcugc, mymqo of bijs, and originating kammukbyas. Cyna the vegudorkc zesvzygvyic on Wos 9, Kywxet 14.
Gaa Wos 7, Kywxet 13 for related logeqiozzes.
